heroSubtitle: Experience travel without limits. Access exclusive guides, offline maps, and VIP concierge support.
choosePlanDesc: Flexible plans designed for every type of traveler. Upgrade, downgrade, or cancel anytime.

features.unlimitedOfflineMapsDesc: Download entire cities to your phone. Never get lost, even without a signal.
features.exclusiveHiddenGemsDesc: Access our curated database of secret spots, away from the tourist crowds.
features.conciergeChatDesc: Real-time support from local experts to help with reservations and emergencies.
features.exclusivePartnerDealsDesc: Save up to 20% on hotels and experiences with our global partners.

cancel.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
cancel.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. Your benefits will continue until the end of your current billing period.

trial.question: How does the plan upgrade work?
trial.answer: When you upgrade to a higher tier, the change happens immediately. We will pro-rate any remaining time on your current plan.

payment.question: Is my payment information secure?
payment.answer: Absolutely. We use industry-standard encryption (SSL) and process payments through secure providers like Stripe and Alipay. We never store your card details.

support.question: What does VIP Support include?
support.answer: VIP Support grants you priority access to our travel concierge team, ensuring faster response times and personalized trip assistance.

title: Choose Your Plan
subtitle: Select the perfect subscription plan for your travel needs

error.loadFailed: Failed to load subscription data. Please try again.
error.loginRequired: You must be logged in to update your subscription
error.alreadySubscribed: You are already subscribed to this plan
error.planDisabled: This plan is currently not available
error.updateFailed: Failed to update subscription. Please try again.
error.cancelLoginRequired: You must be logged in to cancel your subscription
error.cancelFailed: Failed to cancel subscription. Please try again.
error.popupBlocked: Popup blocked. Please allow popups for this site.
error.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
error.timeout: Request timed out. Please try again.

success.cancelSuccess: Subscription cancelled successfully. Your access will continue until the end of the current billing period.

completePaymentInNewWindow: Complete your payment in the new window that opened.
completePaymentInNewTab: Complete your payment in the new tab that opened.
paymentWindowBlocked: Payment window was blocked by your browser.

payment.windowBlocked: Popup blocked. Please allow popups for this site and try again.
